entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Blind River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:19 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 2.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 5:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny

Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 46 %
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: ENE 30 km/h gust 52 km/h

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets near midnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 after midnight then diminishing to 30 gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to rain showers in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
